name: comment-anchors
description: Place anchor tags within comments for easy file & workspace navigation.

commands.title: Parse the current file and look for anchors
Toggle the visibility of comment anchors
Open a file and reveal a line

commentAnchors.tagHighlights.enabled.description: Whether to highlight the anchor tags

commentAnchors.parseDelay.description: The delay between stopping with typing and anchors being reloaded. When you experience hangs or freezes, it is recommended to increase this value

commentAnchors.scrollPosition.description: Where to position the anchor when scrolled to

commentAnchors.editorFolding.description: Whether the enable editor folding. This feature is known to conflict with some language extensions

commentAnchors.workspace.enabled.description: Scan the entire workspace instead of just the currently opened file

commentAnchors.workspace.lazyLoad.description: Require a manual trigger to start the workspace scan. Useful for when you want to reduce load time. (Default false)

commentAnchors.workspace.matchFiles.description: The glob pattern of the files that will be parsed by Comment Anchors

commentAnchors.workspace.excludeFiles.description: The glob pattern of the files that will be excluded from matching by Comment Anchors

commentAnchors.tags.displayInSidebar.description: Whether to display tag names in the sidebar

commentAnchors.tags.displayInGutter.description: Whether to display tags in the gutter

commentAnchors.tags.sortMethod.description: The method used to sort the anchors in the sidebar

commentAnchors.tags.matchCase.description: When true, performs case sensitive matches on tags

commentAnchors.tags.displayHierarchyInWo.description: When true, displays hierarchical anchors in the workspace list

commentAnchors.tags.rulerStyle.description: The display of tags in the ruler lane

commentAnchors.tags.separators.description: List of separators that can be placed between tags and comments

commentAnchors.tags.endTag.description: Specify a custom region end tag

tag.description: The text to match for this tag

iconColor.description: The icon for this tag in the sidebar. Set to null to disable

highlightColor.description: The foreground color applied to the anchor

backgroundColor.description: The background color applied to the anchor

styleComment.description: When true, highlights the comment as well

borderStyle.description: The style applied to the border, see https://www.w3schools.com/cssref/pr_border.asp for more information

borderRadius.description: The curvature radius of the applied border (Requires borderStyle to be set)

isBold.description: Sets whether the tag is rendered in bold

isItalic.description: Sets whether the tag is rendered in italics

scope.description: Defines the scope of this tag. Setting this to "file" makes these tags only visible in the 'File Anchors' list

commentAnchors.tags.list.description: List of additional custom Comment Anchor tags
